description:
• Learn Referencing and its Software from a Leicester University PhD Scholar (Previous Graduate of Lancaster University - Among top 3 Research Universities in UK)
  • 500 Research Students Have taken benefit from it Already
  • The ONLY Course of ITS KIND on UDEMY - Helping Researchers from around the World
  • _______________________________________________________

The course has Two Parts, the first part covers the Major Referencing / Bibliographic styles including Harvard, APA, Chicago and IEEE. The course will cover how you can do Referencing / Bibliography according to these styles for books, journals, reports, book chapter, and webpages.

Once you have learned the basic of Referencing / Bibliography the 2nd Part of the course will teach you Endnote X7 Software. Endnote is the most powerful research and reference manager on the market. Endnote helps you do Referencing in a Click with in text and end-note referencing and bibliography. The software also allows you to change the style as per your need.

Once you have gone through this course i Guarantee that you will do Referencing in a Click and will not see it as a pain at all.
title: Endnote X7 Software, Referencing, and Plagiarism
